00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Module to perform stage value prediction on uvec
00003 !******************************************************************************
00004 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00005 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90            *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00006 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90         *ONTAINS VARIABLES USED IN THE PROGRAM
00007 ! RUNGE_KUTTA.F90               *CONTAINS RK CONSTANTS
00008 !******************************************************************************
00009 
00010       module Stage_value_module
00011   
00012       use precision_vars, only : wp
00013 
00014       implicit none; save
00015     
00016       public :: Stage_Value_Predictor,xnorm
00017       private
00018           
00019       contains
00020       
00021 !==============================================================================      
00022       
00023       subroutine Stage_Value_Predictor(ipred,L,ktime)
00024       
00025       integer, intent(in  ) :: ipred,L,ktime
00026       
00027       if (ipred==2) then
00028         call Stage_Value_Predictor2(L,ktime)
00029       else 
00030         call Stage_Value_Predictor1(L)
00031       endif   
00032       
00033       end subroutine Stage_Value_Predictor
00034       
00035 !==============================================================================
00036       
00037       subroutine Stage_Value_Predictor1(L)
00038       
00039       use control_variables, only : ustage,predvec
00040       use runge_kutta,       only : ns
00041       
00042 !  The SVP routine is called after the newton iteration has converged.  (stage L)
00043 !  Thus, it is predicting the starting guesses of the next stage (L+1)
00044 
00045       integer,                    intent(in   ) :: L
00046     !  real(wp),   dimension(:,:), intent(in   ) :: ustage
00047      ! real(wp),   dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: predvec
00048       !real(wp),   dimension(is,4),         intent(in   ) :: bD
00049       !real(wp),   dimension(is,is),        intent(  out) :: alpha
00050 
00051       !real(wp),   dimension(is)                          :: bint
00052 
00053 
00054 !     real(wp),   dimension(is,is,0:is),   intent(  out) :: svpB
00055 !     real(wp),   dimension(is,is),        intent(  out) :: al3N
00056 !     real(wp),   dimension(is,is),        intent(  out) :: al3D
00057 !     real(wp),   dimension(is,is),        intent(  out) :: al4N
00058 !     real(wp),   dimension(is,is),        intent(  out) :: al4D
00059 
00060       integer :: M!,j
00061 
00062       M = L+1
00063 
00064       if(L <= ns-1) then
00065         predvec(:,M) = ustage(:,L) ! previous guess as starter
00066       else
00067         predvec(:,2) = ustage(:,6)
00068       endif
00069 
00070 !     if(L .ge. 2)then
00071 !       predvec(:,M)   = ustage(:,1)                 ! put predict into start guess
00072 !       do j = 2,L
00073 !         predvec(:,M) = predvec(:,M) + alpha(M,j)*(ustage(:,j)-ustage(:,1))
00074 !       enddo
00075 !     endif
00076 
00077 !     if(L == 2)then
00078 !       bint(1) =  9.9518675264213746_wp
00079 !       bint(2) =  4.8366852488953721_wp
00080 !       bint(3) =-24.163405114569394_wp
00081 !       bint(4) = 14.152132944153401_wp
00082 !       bint(5) =  0.94399768676237158_wp
00083 !       predvec(:,M) = ustage(:,3) + bint(1)*(ustage(:,3)-ustage(:,3))&
00084 !                    &             + bint(2)*(ustage(:,4)-ustage(:,3))&
00085 !                    &             + bint(3)*(ustage(:,5)-ustage(:,3))&
00086 !                    &             + bint(4)*(ustage(:,6)-ustage(:,3))&
00087 !                    &             + bint(5)*(ustage(:,2)-ustage(:,3))
00088 !     endif
00089 
00090       end subroutine Stage_Value_Predictor1
00091  
00092 !==============================================================================
00093 
00094       subroutine Stage_Value_Predictor2(L,ktime)
00095       
00096       use control_variables, only : uvec,uveco,ustage
00097       use runge_kutta,       only : alpha
00098       
00099       integer,                  intent(in  )  :: L,ktime
00100       !real(wp), dimension(:,:), intent(in   ) :: ustage
00101       !real(wp), dimension(:),   intent(inout) :: uvec
00102    !   real(wp), dimension(:),   intent(in   ) :: uveco
00103       !real(wp), dimension(:,:), intent(in   ) :: alpha      
00104             
00105       integer :: j
00106       real(wp), dimension(5) :: bint
00107   
00108         uvec(:)  = uveco(:)          ! put predict into start guess
00109         do j = 2,L-1
00110           uvec(:) = uvec(:) + alpha(L,j)*(ustage(:,j)-uvec(:))
00111         enddo
00112                 
00113         if(L == 2 .and.ktime/=1)then
00114           bint(1) =  9.9518675264213746_wp 
00115           bint(2) =  4.8366852488953721_wp 
00116           bint(3) =-24.163405114569394_wp 
00117           bint(4) = 14.152132944153401_wp
00118           bint(5) =  0.94399768676237158_wp
00119           uvec(:) = ustage(:,3) +bint(1)*(ustage(:,3)-ustage(:,3))&
00120      &                          +bint(2)*(ustage(:,4)-ustage(:,3))&
00121      &                          +bint(3)*(ustage(:,5)-ustage(:,3))&
00122      &                          +bint(4)*(ustage(:,6)-ustage(:,3))&
00123      &                          +bint(5)*(ustage(:,2)-ustage(:,3))
00124         endif    
00125 
00126       end subroutine Stage_Value_Predictor2
00127 
00128 !==============================================================================
00129 !  COMPUTES NORM OF TWO VECTORS
00130       function xnorm(vec1,vec2)
00131       
00132       real(wp)                           :: xnorm
00133       real(wp), dimension(:), intent(in) :: vec1,vec2
00134       
00135       xnorm = sqrt(dot_product(vec1(:)-vec2(:),vec1(:)-vec2(:))/  &
00136      &                          dot_product(vec1(:),vec1(:)))
00137       
00138       return
00139       end function xnorm
00140      
00141 !==============================================================================
00142       end module Stage_value_module
